code: @Test public void testRestartSpringIssue() throws Exception {     context.getRouteController().startRoute("foo").     ProducerTemplate producer = context.createProducerTemplate().     producer.start().     Object out = producer.requestBody("activemq:queue:foo", "Foo").     assertEquals("Bye Foo", out).     // on purpose forget to stop the producer and it should still work     context.getRouteController().stopRoute("foo").     context.getRouteController().startRoute("foo").     out = producer.requestBody("activemq:queue:foo", "Bar").     assertEquals("Bye Bar", out). }
